articles.description: Two years after scoring a hat-trick in the 1894 FA Cup final, Jimmy Logan was buried in an unmarked pauper's grave. More than 120 years later he got a headstone thanks to some Notts County fans.
articles.title: Jimmy Logan: How Notts County's FA Cup final hat-trick hero finally got a headstone
